DOC.brief_title: Predictive Value Endometrial Cytokines Endometrial Implantation Cases Intracytoplasmic Sperm Injection
DOC.detailed_description: This prospective cohort study , perform 80 woman attend Obstetrics Gynecology Department Benha University Hospital invitro fertilization/intracytoplasmic sperm injection treatment private IVF center . None undergo one prior unsuccessful embryo transfer . Method randomization : Simple random sample , subset individual ( sample ) chosen large set ( population ) . Each individual chosen randomly entirely chance , individual sample probability choose stage sample process , subset k individual probability choose sample subset k individual ( Yates et al. , 2008 ) . Methods : The patient subject follow : - History . - General examination . - Endometrial secretion aspiration . - Determination cytokine profile . - Detection implantation rate . Inclusion criterion : 1 . Age young 37 year . 2 . Having regular proven ovulatory menstrual cycle length 26-35 day . 3 . Body mass index less 35 kg/m2 . 4 . Serum follicle stimulate hormone estradiol within normal range . Indications IVF : Tubal pathology , unexplained infertility , male factor . Exclusion criterion : Gross uterine pathology . Steps performance : All woman inclusion criterion subject super ovulation protocol follow hcg adminstration follicle reach 18-20 mm . Ovum retrieval do 35 hour follow hcg injection . Five millilitre salin inject intrauterine aspirate ovum retrieval.Endometrial secretion , aspirate immediately ovum retrieval 80 woman undergo IVF , analyze use multiplex immunoassay soluble regulator implantation , namely Interleukin ( IL ) -1b , Tumor Necrosis Factor ( TNF ) -a , . In order detect implantation predictor .
